column2: "Hey partner, what are you up to? What? You were asked to do something by that cat?"
"You really are something, aren't you? So, what did it ask you to do?"
"Hmm, it was asking about a cute girl? So, why are you coming to me?"
"Wait, a cute girl? What the hell?! I'm a guy!"
"Damn it! If you see that cat again, let me know! Don't forget it!"
"Oh, nice timing, partner."
"There was something I wanted to give you. Here, take this."
"I won't use it, so it's better off in your hands."
"No need to thank me. We're partners, right?"
"You're always looking out for me. It's the least I could do! Haha!"
"Received <yellow>Synthesizer<c> from Afin."
"Received <yellow>Synthesizer<c> from Afin."
"Received <yellow>Synthesizer<c> from Afin."
"Received <yellow>One Point<c> from Afin."
"Received <yellow>Synthesizer<c> from Afin."
"Received <yellow>Synthesizer<c> from Afin."
"Received <yellow>Synthesizer<c> from Afin."
"Received <yellow>Homing Emission<c> from Afin."
"Received <yellow>Synthesizer<c> from Afin."
"Received <yellow>Synthesizer<c> from Afin."
"Received <yellow><%skit_text><c> from Afin."
"Wow... This place is huge! It's way different from where I lived before. Well, that place was pretty big too."
"I can't believe we survived running into Darkers on our very first mission. We must be super lucky! Haha."
"It was pretty scary at the time, but now that I can look back on it, I feel good about how we handled it."
"I was surprised to find out that ARKS basically live normal lives. I was expecting things to be a lot stricter."
"We're still pretty new, so the places and planets we can go to are limited."
"If we want to go to more places, we'll have to prove ourselves first. We've got a long road ahead of us, partner."
"As ARKS, we command a lot of respect, but that doesn't mean we can just do whatever we want."
"They might let us get away with unbecoming behaviour from time to time, but make no mistake, they're always watching us."
"It's so nice here. I want to spend all my time relaxing. But as soon as they assign me a mission, I have to leave..."
"There's a lot of different skills, aren't there? It's kind of hard to remember them all."
"Still, you never know when they could come in handy, so I guess I should just knuckle down and learn them."
"Hmmm... I don't have any good weapons. I wonder if there are any new ones I could get?"
"I joined ARKS to look for someone, so I prefer to use lighter weapons."
"...But when I tell people that, they get mad at me because they think I don't take fighting seriously. I don't want to come off like I'm not serious."

"We can switch our class freely, but the older ARKS don't have that option.
...I wonder what changed?"

"Not all ARKS are fighters. I've heard a rumor saying that there's a team of ARKS who buy and sell information.
...I wonder if I could do that?"
"I knew finding someone out there wouldn't be easy, but this is taking way longer than I thought. I guess I'll just have to be patient."
"Even more Darkers! It feels like we've been running into them all over the place lately. Maybe it's just me."
"Seeing you complete so many Client Orders is making me happy, too. Haha."
"The other day, one of the other ARKS told me \"You don't have any courage, but at least you're aware of that.\" That's a bit harsh, don't you think?"

"The scary part is that there's people out there who don't have any more courage than I do, but think they do.
...I guess they're just reckless."
"I was wondering. How long have the Darkers have been our enemies? History was never my strong point."

"Everyone looks up to us ARKS...
I never realized the job would be this tiring, though... Ha..."
"Who are the strongest ARKS? I guess that would be the Council of Six. I wonder what they're like. Do you think they're all super-buff?"
"...Huh? You say they're out in the field right now? Does that mean you've met them already?"
"It's funny how everyone's so calm even though the ARKS ship was just attacked. I guess people around here must be used to that kind of thing."
"...I feel like there's something wrong with you if you think that's normal."
"I didn't think I was joining ARKS to protect other people, but..."
"I mean, it's natural to step in when your home gets attacked, isn't it? For some reason, it's got me second-guessing myself."
"The mood around here has been really heavy lately. It's probably because Dark Falz is back, huh?"
"Under the circumstances, I can understand why people would be feeling a bit depressed."
"I've heard quite a few rumors about that berserk dragon."
"They say that thing's crazy strong, so if you see it, be careful."
"That Battle Championship thing sounds interesting. I guess it's good to blow off some steam once in a while."

"It sounds like a lot of people are planning to take part...
I wonder if I should sign up?"

"............
Oh, sorry partner. I was lost in thought."

"I know I'll never get anything done just by thinking about it...
But I'm no good at putting my thoughts into action."

"............
Oh, sorry partner. I was lost in thought."

"I know I'll never get anything done just by thinking about it...
But I'm no good at putting my thoughts into action."

"...Hey, partner. About before...
...No, I shouldn't bother you. Don't worry about it."
"Oh, right, you found some kind of huge treasure, didn't you? You must be exhausted after a find like that."
"...This can't be happening. My sister turns up alive, only she's a Dark Falz..."
"Maybe I should just give up and accept that she's gone..."
"...No. As long as she's alive, there must be a way to bring her back. I'll find a way."
"...This can't be happening. My sister turns up alive, only she's a Dark Falz..."
"Maybe I should just give up and accept that she's gone..."
"...No. As long as she's alive, there must be a way to bring her back. I'll find a way."
"Hey, partner. You became a heck of a big deal when I wasn't looking, huh?"

"I had no idea you were the type to get tangled up at the center of things like you have...
Honestly, I feel a little sorry for you."
"Yo, partner. Things have changed a lot since we joined ARKS, huh?"

"I mean, the overhauls around here happened practically overnight...
I guess I'll just have to try and adapt."
"You always seem to have such a positive attitude. I guess the reason you can get so much done is that you never give up."

"I wish I could be as daring as you...
...It's just not in my nature."
"This is hopeless. I've been working on this for ages, and I still haven't found a trace of my sister."

"I heard she showed up around the mining base, so I've been focusing my efforts there...
Well, I knew it wouldn't be easy."
"Watching you gives me the determination I need to keep going."
"I've heard there's been a lot of sightings of my sister out near the mining base."
"You never gave up, no matter what. I just have to act like you do. Then I'll find my sister."
"Thanks for everything, partner. It's thanks to your determination that I was able to meet my sister."
"I still have a lot to think about, though."
"I've come this far. I'm not going to give up now."
"Yo, partner. Sounds like you went through a lot. I'm glad you're alright."
"Me? I'm still trying to get through to my sister. So far, she just runs away whenever I get near her."
"But I won't give up. Not now."
"How are you doing, partner? When I heard what happened to you, I was worried sick."
"I know you've got a lot to deal with, but remember, it's OK to rely on other people once in a while."
"Don't try and bear the weight of the world all by yourself. If you need my help, all you have to do is ask."
"Watching the way you threw yourself into everything without giving up is what gave me the strength to get where I am now."

"I never could have pictured myself dealing with seeing someone I love become a Dark Falz...
But I haven't given up, not once."
"As long as I have your help, I feel like I can do anything."
"Yo, partner. I see you've been busy."
"Watching you has taught me a valuable lesson. As long as you don't give up, anything's possible."
"And everything worked out for the best in the end. Personally, I couldn't be happier!"
"Sorry about this, partner. I just didn't have any idea what to do. Calling you was my last resort."
"I don't have a clue what's going on, even. This girl just appeared out of Lida somehow."
"Even Lida doesn't know how it happened. When are we gonna catch a break...?"

"なんか大変なことになったよな。
封印された【若人】の力が
出かかってるとかさ……"

"アウロラが出てきたタイミングには
意味があるって話だけどさ
正直、おれにはわかんねーや。"

"ま、ともかくありがとな相棒。
おれだけだったら、多分テンパッて
終わってたと思うから助かったぜ。"
"Yo, partner! Haha, it's great to see you again. It's been a long time."

"So, what does it feel like to sleep for two years?
...It felt like no time passed at all, huh? Well, plenty of time passed out here."
"Still, like they say, absence makes the heart grow fonder!"

"相棒！\u3000相変わらず忙しそうだな！
息抜きしたくなったら
いつでも誘ってくれよ？"

"相棒にとっては一瞬でも
おれにとっては二年だからな。
久々に任務、一緒に行きたいんだ。"

"アークスの組織図的に言うと
おれとユク姉も総務部になるんだ。
そう、マリアさんのところ。"

"次席のサラがしっかりしてるから
こっちは特に問題は起きてないけど……
情報部は、色々大変そうだよなー。"

"総務部ってわりと大所帯でさ
だから結構、知り合いが増えたぜ。"

"話す機会がなかった人とも話せたり
相棒のことを聞いてきたり
そんな感じだよ。"

"人と接することが多いから
そのおかげでユク姉も
ここに馴染んできてくれたと思う。"

"よう相棒。
大丈夫そうか？"

"なんか今回もでかい話に
なってきたよな……"

"まあ、相棒なら大丈夫だと思うけど
手が必要になれば言ってくれよ。"

"……やっぱり人が相手だと
いろいろ策を練ってきて、こっちが
やりにくいようにしてくるな。"

"ダーカーみたいに数で押されるのも
大変だけど、今回みたいにいろいろ策を
使われるのは、それはそれで面倒だな。"

"戦いなんてせずに、話し合って
全部解決すればいいんだけどなあ……"

"相棒、ありがとな。
何が？\u3000って、この前の襲撃時。
戦ってくれたじゃんか。"

"おれたち、無力だったから
避難誘導ぐらいしかできなくてさ。
……なさけないよな。"

"……でも今後はこういう事態に備えて
外部からリミッターを解除できるよう
準備するみたいだぜ。"

"アルって子、元ダークファルスって話。
おれも聞いてるぜ、っていうかそれで
ユク姉が見解を聞かれてたよ。"

"ダーカー特有の嫌な感じはしなかったし
全然気付かなかったな。
そういうもんなのかな。"

"マザーの力を奪っていった
アーデムって人は、世界再編の時が
云々って言ってたんだろ？"

"世界再編って何をする気なんだろうな。
作り替える、ってほどの力は
エーテルにはないはずだろ？"

"幻創種を創り出すみたいな要領で
新しい世界でも作るつもりか？
……なんてな。"

"世界再編って、まんま世界を
作り替えるってことだったのかよ。
しかも、それが可能っぽいって……"

"マザーの力を奪ったから、なのか？
でも、あれの大本ってアークスというか
フォトナーにあるんだよな……"

"巡り巡って、こっちの責任な気もする。
なんとかしないと、だな。"

"神様ってのもぶっ倒しちまうとか
流石というか何というか……
すごいって感想しか出てこない。"

"しっかし、フォトナーもずいぶんと
やらかしまくってるんだなぁ。
発展の代償ってヤツなのかね。"

"いよいよ、って言うのかな。
それとも、ついに、って言うべきか？"

"緊張するよな、こういうの。
……おれが緊張してどうするんだって
思うけどさ。"

"とにかく、おれたちは相棒を支える。
それだけに全力を尽くすからな。"
"よっ、相棒！\u3000おかえり！"

"シャオから無事って連絡は来てたし
絶対大丈夫って思ってたけど……
本当によかったよ。"

"最近出撃が少なめだから
みんな落ち着いた感じだぜ。"

"……でも、相棒。お前は違う感じだ。
何だかかなり大変そう。"

"それって、おれとかには手伝えない
……こと、なんだろうな。
だって、そんな顔してるし。"

"なんて言ったらいいのか
わからないけど……頑張れよ！
困ったら、すぐに力になるからさ！"
"Aurora and Lida just disappeared!"
"A symbol appeared beneath their feet and the next thing I know... \"Poof!\" They were gone without a trace!"
"I can't find them anywhere. What the hell is going on here?"
"Partner! Lida is back home! Safe and sound."
"Lida didn't give me any details, but it was all thanks to you, right? Thank you so much!"
"Lida and Aurora get a lot of calls from the Intelligence Division."
"They don't have any information about the Goddess of Demise, so they want to ask Aurora, since she knows a lot about the past."
"Client Orders"

"As you progress through the game, your character may get requests on occasion. These are called \"Client Orders\".

The nature of the clients requests vary, and may involve things like taking instructions to clear a certain quest or being asked to gather certain items.

If a character has Client Orders available, a blue icon appears above their head."

"In the case of defeating enemies and gathering their items, if you have not received a Client Order to do so, they will not drop their items.

Make sure to inform the individual once the objective have been achieved. You can receive an expression of gratitude.

Once you've progressed further in the game, you can try to talk to other characters. You might be able to get new Client Orders."

"As you progress through the game, your character may get requests on occasion. These are called \"Client Orders\".

The nature of the clients requests vary, and may involve things like taking instructions to clear a certain quest or being asked to gather certain items.

If a character has Client Orders available, a blue icon appears above their head."

"In the case of defeating enemies and gathering their items, if you have not received a Client Order to do so, they will not drop their items.

Make sure to inform the individual once the objective have been achieved. You can receive an expression of gratitude.

Once you've progressed further in the game, you can try to talk to other characters. You might be able to get new Client Orders."
"Oh hey, you came. I'm glad to have someone like you as my partner. Could you listen to me for a sec?"
"You can now call Afin as a partner."
"Tired, partner? I hear this Shiva thing has you tied up with all sorts of emergency meetings."
"...I don't really understand who she is or where she's from, but I've never seen an enemy we couldn't beat."
"I want to support you as well as I can, so I'll be training until we've got a concrete plan."
"...I think things are about to get really tough, partner."
"Those powerful enemies came out of nowhere, and there was nothing we could do to stop them, no matter how hard we fought..."

"Even if we get to Amduscia, there's no guarantee things will get any easier...
But I have a feeling we'll find something there."
"Great job, partner! Now that Xiao's back, things are starting to look up!"
"I'm feeling a lot more fired up now. When we're out there together, you watch me go to work!"
"The A.I.S. we sent to attack them were annihilated..."
"I knew she was insanely powerful, but I'm starting to think she might be TOO powerful..."
"We need to be much more careful! Hey partner, if there's anything I can do, just say the word!"

"We thought we'd drained Shiva's power, but it was really just Mitra...
I can't lie, that one hurt."
"But we still took down a Photoner, so it must be possible to take down Shiva too!"
"But that can wait, partner. I heard you got injured, so you should get some rest."
"It's tough going out on these sorties over and over, but right now we need to hold firm."
"We're partners, so if you're having trouble, you can always come to me. I'll do anything I can to help!"
"It's finally time, partner. Time to take down Shiva..."

"I'll do whatever I can to help you...
For Lida and Aurora's sake."
"We're both gonna make it through this thing alive, partner. That's a promise!"
"Partner! We did it! That battle took a lot out of us, but we gave it everything we had."
"And look at what you managed, partner. You've defeated someone that we couldn't even lay a finger on before."
"I'm really proud of you, partner! I'll have to work extra hard in the future if I want to catch up with you!"
